name: Jab Harry Met Sejal
review:
A senseless story that flourishes on Imtiaz Ali's direction for a while. The moment when you get connected and feel to avoid all flaws, it breaks the connection towards the end. It's the right time for Imtiaz to work more on his writing now. Besides, SRK and Anushka were wonderful in their respective characters.

Storyline Rating: 1

Acting Rating: 3
Shah Rukh Khan: 3
Anushka Sharma: 3

Direction Rating: 3

Music Rating: 3

Cinematography: 4

Editing: 3
